DOC.brief_title: Subsymptom Threshold Exercise Protocol Following Mild TBI
DOC.detailed_description: The propose pilot randomize control clinical trial ( RCCT ) provide preliminary data examine effect novel intervention promote brain health mild Traumatic Brain Injury ( mTBI ) . The study implement randomize controlled clinical trial 6 week exercise intervention ( STEP ) participants persistent mTBI symptom , compare STEP standard care practice control . We demonstrate feasibility acceptability STEP intervention . We hypothesize STEP lead meaningful improvement objective measure self-reported mTBI symptom , formal neuropsychological performance , postural stability .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participants sustain concussion experience symptom resolution 4 week , indicate PostConcussive Scale Revised ( PCSR ) score 20 high 4 week postinjury beyond ; 2 . Participants high school college age ( 1422 year old ) ; 3 . English speaking . 1 . Outside age range study ( High school college age ) 2 .
